channel.title: Updates: FEMA Disaster Housing [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's FEMA Disaster Housing request

item.title: Documents Provided via Interim Response
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On April 3, 2024, FEMA provided an ‚Äúinterim response‚Äù containing seven documents. Five of the documents, spanning 139 pages, were not redacted; the two other documents, spanning 100 pages, were entirely redacted.

item.title: Request Acknowledged, Fee Waiver Conditionally Granted
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On September 27, 2022, FEMA emailed an acknowledgment letter üìÑ regarding this request. The agency “has determined that it will conditionally grant your request for a fee waiver.” It also notes, “Due to current working conditions in response to the COVID-19 outbreak, please expect a delay in our response.”
